trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for enumerations.
trans-unit.target: 为枚举提供基类。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration is a set of named constants whose underlying type is any integral type.
trans-unit.target: 枚举是一组其基础类型是任何整型类型的已命名常数。

trans-unit.source: If no underlying type is explicitly declared, <xref:System.Int32> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果显式声明没有基础类型，<xref:System.Int32>使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Enum> is the base class for all enumerations in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum> 是.NET Framework 中的所有枚举的基类。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration types are defined by the `enum` keyword in C# and the `Enum`...`End Enum` construct in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 枚举类型由定义`enum`C# 中的关键字和`Enum`...`End Enum`在 Visual Basic 中构造。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Enum> provides methods for comparing instances of this class, converting the value of an instance to its string representation, converting the string representation of a number to an instance of this class, and creating an instance of a specified enumeration and value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum> 提供用于比较此类的实例、 将实例的值转换为其字符串表示形式，将数字的字符串表示转换为此类的实例和创建一个指定的枚举和值的实例方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also treat an enumeration as a bit field.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以将枚举视为位域。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Non-Exclusive Members and the Flags Attribute](#Flags) section and the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[非独占成员和标志特性](#Flags)部分和<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>主题。

trans-unit.source: Creating an enumeration type
trans-unit.target: 创建枚举类型

trans-unit.source: Programming languages typically provide syntax to declare an enumeration that consists of a set of named constants and their values.
trans-unit.target: 编程语言通常提供语法声明一个命名的常量及其值的一组组成的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the syntax used by C# and Visual Basic to define an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 C# 和 Visual Basic 用于定义枚举的语法。

trans-unit.source: It creates an enumeration named `ArrivalStatus` that has three members: `ArrivalStatus.Early`, `ArrivalStatus.OnTime`, and `ArrivalStatus.Late`.
trans-unit.target: 它将创建名为枚举`ArrivalStatus`有三个成员： `ArrivalStatus.Early`， `ArrivalStatus.OnTime`，和`ArrivalStatus.Late`。

trans-unit.source: Note that in both cases, the enumeration does not explicitly inherit from <xref:System.Enum>; the inheritance relationship is handled implicitly by the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在这两种情况下，枚举不会显式继承从<xref:System.Enum>; 由编译器进行隐式处理继承关系。

trans-unit.source: You should never create an enumeration type whose underlying type is non-integral or <xref:System.Char>.
trans-unit.target: 切勿创建其基础类型是非整型的枚举类型或<xref:System.Char>。

trans-unit.source: Although you can create such an enumeration type by using reflection, method calls that use the resulting type are unreliable and may also throw additional exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 虽然你可以通过使用反射来创建此类枚举类型，则使用生成的类型的方法调用是不可靠的和也可能会引发其他异常。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating an enumeration type
trans-unit.target: 实例化枚举类型

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate an enumeration type just as you instantiate any other value type: by declaring a variable and assigning one of the enumeration's constants to it.
trans-unit.target: 可以实例化枚举类型，就像实例化任何其他值类型： 通过声明一个变量并为其赋值的枚举常量之一。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates an `ArrivalStatus` whose value is `ArrivalStatus.OnTime`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化`ArrivalStatus`其值是`ArrivalStatus.OnTime`。

trans-unit.source: You can also instantiate an enumeration value in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 你还可以通过以下方式在实例化一个枚举值：

trans-unit.source: By using a particular programming language's features to cast (as in C#) or convert (as in Visual Basic) an integer value to an enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用采用特定编程语言的功能 （如 C#) 强制转换或转换 （如 Visual Basic 中) 的整数值的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an `ArrivalStatus` object whose value is `ArrivalStatus.Early` in this way.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建`ArrivalStatus`对象，其值是`ArrivalStatus.Early`以这种方式。

trans-unit.source: By calling its implicit default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用其隐式的默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: As the following example shows, in this case the underlying value of the enumeration instance is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如下面的示例所示，在这种情况下枚举实例的基础值为 0。

trans-unit.source: However, this is not necessarily the value of a valid constant in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这不一定在枚举中的有效常量的值。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A> or <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%2A> method to parse a string that contains the name of a constant in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A>或<xref:System.Enum.TryParse%2A>方法，以便分析包含枚举中常数的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Parsing Enumeration Values](#parsing) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[分析枚举值](#parsing)部分。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Enum.ToObject%2A> method to convert an integral value to an enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.Enum.ToObject%2A>方法将一个整数值转换为枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Performing Conversions](#conversions) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[执行转换](#conversions)部分。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration best practices
trans-unit.target: 枚举最佳做法

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use the following best practices when you define enumeration types:
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你在定义枚举类型时使用下列最佳方案：

trans-unit.source: If you have not defined an enumeration member whose value is 0, consider creating a `None` enumerated constant.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尚未定义枚举成员，其值为 0，请考虑创建`None`枚举的常数。

trans-unit.source: By default, the memory used for the enumeration is initialized to zero by the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，用于枚举的内存初始化为零的公共语言运行时。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, if you do not define a constant whose value is zero, the enumeration will contain an illegal value when it is created.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果未定义其值为零的常量，枚举将包含在创建时非法值。

trans-unit.source: If there is an obvious default case that your application has to represent, consider using an enumerated constant whose value is zero to represent it.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有明显的默认情况下，你的应用程序具有表示，请考虑使用枚举常量其值为零表示它。

trans-unit.source: If there is no default case, consider using an enumerated constant whose value is zero to specify the case that is not represented by any of the other enumerated constants.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何默认情况下，请考虑使用由任何其他枚举常量的枚举的常数其值为零，以指定不会显示的大小写。

trans-unit.source: Do not specify enumerated constants that are reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 不要指定保留供将来使用的枚举的常数。

trans-unit.source: When you define a method or property that takes an enumerated constant as a value, consider validating the value.
trans-unit.target: 当你定义的方法或属性，它采用作为值的枚举的常数时，请考虑验证值。

trans-unit.source: The reason is that you can cast a numeric value to the enumeration type even if that numeric value is not defined in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 原因是，即使该数值不在枚举中定义，你可以强制转换为枚举类型的数字值。

trans-unit.source: Additional best practices for enumeration types whose constants are bit fields are listed in the [Non-Exclusive Members and the Flags Attribute](#Flags) section.
trans-unit.target: 中列出其常量是位域的枚举类型的其他最佳实践[非独占成员和标志特性](#Flags)部分。

trans-unit.source: Performing operations with enumerations
trans-unit.target: 使用枚举执行操作

trans-unit.source: You cannot define new methods when you are creating an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 创建枚举时，不能定义新的方法。

trans-unit.source: However, an enumeration type inherits a complete set of static and instance methods from the <xref:System.Enum> class.
trans-unit.target: 但是，枚举类型继承一组完整的静态和实例方法从<xref:System.Enum>类。

trans-unit.source: The following sections survey most of these methods, in addition to several other methods that are commonly used when working with enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 下列各节调查这些方法，除了使用枚举值时常用的其他几个方法中的大多数。

trans-unit.source: Performing conversions
trans-unit.target: 执行转换的转换

trans-unit.source: You can convert between an enumeration member and its underlying type by using a casting (in C#) or conversion (in Visual Basic) operator.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用强制转换 （在 C# 中) 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的转换运算符枚举成员和其基础类型之间进行转换。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses casting or conversion operators to perform conversions both from an integer to an enumeration value and from an enumeration value to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用强制转换或转换运算符来执行转换，同时从给枚举值的整数和一个枚举值为整数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum> class also includes a <xref:System.Enum.ToObject%2A> method that converts a value of any integral type to an enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum>类还进行了<xref:System.Enum.ToObject%2A>将任何整数类型的值转换为枚举值的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Enum.ToObject%28System.Type%2CSystem.Int32%29> method to convert an <xref:System.Int32> to an `ArrivalStatus` value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Enum.ToObject%28System.Type%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法将转换<xref:System.Int32>到`ArrivalStatus`值。

trans-unit.source: Note that, because the <xref:System.Enum.ToObject%2A> returns a value of type <xref:System.Object>, the use of a casting or conversion operator may still be necessary to cast the object to the enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，因为<xref:System.Enum.ToObject%2A>返回类型的值<xref:System.Object>，强制转换或转换运算符的使用可能仍有必要将对象转换为枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: When converting an integer to an enumeration value, it is possible to assign a value that is not actually a member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当将整数转换为一个枚举值，则可以将分配一个值，不是实际的枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this, you can pass the integer to the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method before performing the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止此情况，你可以传递到整数<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>方法，然后再执行转换。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses this method to determine whether the elements in an array of integer values can be converted to `ArrivalStatus` values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用此方法来确定的整数值的数组中的元素是否可以转换为`ArrivalStatus`值。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Enum> class provides explicit interface implementations of the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface for converting from an enumeration value to an integral type, you should use the methods of the <xref:System.Convert> class, such as <xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%2A>, to perform these conversions.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Enum>类提供的显式接口实现<xref:System.IConvertible>接口对于从一个枚举值转换为整数类型，应使用的方法<xref:System.Convert>类，如<xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%2A>到执行这些转换。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how you can use the <xref:System.Enum.GetUnderlyingType%2A> method along with the <xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert an enumeration value to its underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Enum.GetUnderlyingType%2A>方法以及<xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将一个枚举值转换为其基础类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that this example does not require the underlying type of the enumeration to be known at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此示例不需要在编译时已知枚举的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: Parsing enumeration values
trans-unit.target: 分析枚举值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A> and <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%2A> methods allow you to convert the string representation of an enumeration value to that value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A>和<xref:System.Enum.TryParse%2A>方法允许您将一个枚举值的字符串表示转换成该值。

trans-unit.source: The string representation can be either the name or the underlying value of an enumeration constant.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式可以是的名称或基础值的枚举常量。

trans-unit.source: Note that the parsing methods will successfully convert string representations of numbers that are not members of a particular enumeration if the strings can be converted to a value of the enumeration's underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 注意： 分析方法已成功转换的不是特定枚举的成员，如果字符串可以转换为枚举的基础类型的值的数字的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this, the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method can be called to ensure that the result of the parsing method is a valid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此情形，<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>可以调用方法，以确保分析方法的结果是一个有效的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The example illustrates this approach and demonstrates calls to both the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29> and <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2C%60%600%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示了此方法，并演示对同时调用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29>和<xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2C%60%600%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the non-generic parsing method returns an object that you may have to cast (in C#) or convert (in Visual Basic) to the appropriate enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，非泛型分析方法返回一个对象，你可能需要强制转换 （在 C# 中) 或 （在 Visual Basic 中) 转换为相应的枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: Formatting enumeration values
trans-unit.target: 格式设置的枚举值

trans-unit.source: You can convert enumeration values to their string representations by calling the static <xref:System.Enum.Format%2A> method, as well as the overloads of the instance <xref:System.Enum.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过调用静态枚举值转换为其字符串表示形式<xref:System.Enum.Format%2A>方法，以及该实例的重载<xref:System.Enum.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use a format string to control the precise way in which an enumeration value is represented as a string.
trans-unit.target: 一个格式字符串可用于控制在其中一个枚举值表示为字符串的精确方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses each of the supported enumeration format strings ("G" or "g", "D" or "d", "X" or "x", and "F" or "f" ) to convert a member of the `ArrivalStatus` enumeration to its string representations.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用每个受支持的枚举格式字符串"（"G"或"g"、"D"或"d"、 X"或"x"和"F"或"f"） 将转换的成员`ArrivalStatus`枚举其字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Iterating enumeration members
trans-unit.target: 循环访问枚举成员

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum> type does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface, which would enable you to iterate members of a collection by using a `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic) construct.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum>类型未实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>接口，从而使你能通过使用循环集合的成员`foreach`（在 C# 中) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic 中) 构造。

trans-unit.source: However, you can enumerate members in either of two ways.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以枚举中两种方法之一的成员。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A> method to retrieve a string array containing the names of the enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A>方法来检索包含枚举成员的名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: Next, for each element of the string array, you can call the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A> method to convert the string to its equivalent enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，对字符串数组的每个元素，您可以调用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A>方法将字符串转换为其等效的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this approach.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了这种方法。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A> method to retrieve an array that contains the underlying values in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A>枚举中的方法来检索一个数组，包含基础值。

trans-unit.source: Next, for each element of the array, you can call the <xref:System.Enum.ToObject%2A> method to convert the integer to its equivalent enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，对该数组的每个元素，您可以调用<xref:System.Enum.ToObject%2A>方法将整数转换为其等效的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this approach.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了这种方法。

trans-unit.source: Non-exclusive members and the Flags attribute
trans-unit.target: 非独占成员和标志特性

trans-unit.source: One common use of an enumeration is to represent a set of mutually exclusive values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举的一个常见用途是表示一组互斥的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, an `ArrivalStatus` instance can have a value of `Early`, `OnTime`, or `Late`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`ArrivalStatus`实例可以具有的值`Early`， `OnTime`，或`Late`。

trans-unit.source: It makes no sense for the value of an `ArrivalStatus` instance to reflect more than one enumeration constant.
trans-unit.target: 没有意义的值的`ArrivalStatus`实例以反映多个枚举常量。

trans-unit.source: In other cases, however, the value of an enumeration object can include multiple enumeration members, and each member represents a bit field in the enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情况下，但是，枚举对象的值可以包含多个枚举成员，并且每个成员表示中的枚举值的位字段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> attribute can be used to indicate that the enumeration consists of bit fields.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.FlagsAttribute>特性用于指示的位域构成的枚举。

trans-unit.source: For example, an enumeration named `Pets` might be used to indicate the kinds of pets in a household.
trans-unit.target: 例如，名为枚举`Pets`可能用于指示在全体宠物的种类。

trans-unit.source: It can be defined as follows.
trans-unit.target: 可以如下所示定义它。

trans-unit.source: The `Pets` enumeration can then be used as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: `Pets`可以然后使用枚举，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: The following best practices should be used when defining a bitwise enumeration and applying the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 定义按位时，应使用下列最佳方案枚举并将其应用<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> custom attribute for an enumeration only if a bitwise operation (AND, OR, EXCLUSIVE OR) is to be performed on a numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>枚举才是对数字值执行按位运算 （AND、 OR 独占或） 的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Define enumeration constants in powers of two, that is, 1, 2, 4, 8, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 在 2 的幂，即 1、 2、 4、 8 等中定义枚举常量。

trans-unit.source: This means the individual flags in combined enumeration constants do not overlap.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着不重叠中组合的枚举常量的各个标志。

trans-unit.source: Consider creating an enumerated constant for commonly used flag combinations.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑创建针对常用的标志组合的枚举的常数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have an enumeration used for file I/O operations that contains the enumerated constants `Read = 1` and `Write = 2`, consider creating the enumerated constant `ReadWrite = Read OR Write`, which combines the `Read` and `Write` flags.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有用于文件 I/O 操作的枚举包含枚举的常数`Read = 1`和`Write = 2`，请考虑创建枚举的常数`ReadWrite = Read OR Write`，它结合`Read`和`Write`标志。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the bitwise OR operation used to combine the flags might be considered an advanced concept in some circumstances that should not be required for simple tasks.
trans-unit.target: 此外，可用于组合标志的按位 OR 操作视为在某些情况下，不应为用于简单任务所需的一个高级的概念。

trans-unit.source: Use caution if you define a negative number as a flag enumerated constant because many flag positions might be set to 1, which might make your code confusing and encourage coding errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果为标志枚举常量中定义为负数，因为很多标志位置可能会设置为 1，这可能会使你的代码的混乱，并鼓励编码错误，请务必小心。

trans-unit.source: A convenient way to test whether a flag is set in a numeric value is to call the instance <xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 测试是否在数值中设置一个标志一种简便方式是调用实例<xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to performing a bitwise AND operation between the numeric value and the flag enumerated constant, which sets all bits in the numeric value to zero that do not correspond to the flag, and then testing whether the result of that operation is equal to the flag enumerated constant.
trans-unit.target: 它相当于执行之间的数字值和标志枚举的常数，它将所有位都设置为不对应于标志的零的数字值中，按位与运算，然后测试该操作的结果是否等于标志枚举的常数。

trans-unit.source: This is illustrated in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 下列示例对此进行了阐释。

trans-unit.source: Use `None` as the name of the flag enumerated constant whose value is zero.
trans-unit.target: 使用`None`用作枚举其值为零的常量的标志名称。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the `None` enumerated constant in a bitwise AND operation to test for a flag because the result is always zero.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用`None`按位运算中，来测试一个标志，因为结果始终为零的枚举的常数。

trans-unit.source: However, you can perform a logical, not a bitwise, comparison between the numeric value and the `None` enumerated constant to determine whether any bits in the numeric value are set.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以执行的逻辑不之间的数字值的按位、 比较和`None`枚举的常量，以确定是否已设置在数值中的任何位。

trans-unit.source: This is illustrated in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 下列示例对此进行了阐释。

trans-unit.source: Do not define an enumeration value solely to mirror the state of the enumeration itself.
trans-unit.target: 未定义一个枚举值，只是为了镜像与枚举本身的状态。

trans-unit.source: For example, do not define an enumerated constant that merely marks the end of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不定义仅用于枚举的结束标记的枚举的常数。

trans-unit.source: If you need to determine the last value of the enumeration, check for that value explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要确定在枚举的最后一个值，请显式检查该值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can perform a range check for the first and last enumerated constant if all values within the range are valid.
trans-unit.target: 此外，你可以执行范围检查第一个和最后一个枚举常量，如果范围内的所有值都是有效。

trans-unit.source: Adding enumeration methods
trans-unit.target: 添加枚举方法

trans-unit.source: Because enumeration types are defined by language structures, such as `enum` (C#) and `Enum` (Visual Basic), you cannot define custom methods for an enumeration type other than those methods inherited from the <xref:System.Enum> class.
trans-unit.target: 因为枚举类型按语言结构，如定义`enum`(C#) 和`Enum`(Visual Basic 中)，不能定义为非继承自的那些方法枚举类型的自定义方法<xref:System.Enum>类。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use extension methods to add functionality to a particular enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以使用扩展方法将功能添加到特定的枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `Grades` enumeration represents the possible letter grades that a student may receive in a class.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，`Grades` 枚举表示学生可能在班里收到的字母等级分。

trans-unit.source: An extension method named `Passing` is added to the `Grades` type so that each instance of that type now "knows" whether it represents a passing grade or not.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将一个名为 `Passing` 的扩展方法添加到 `Grades` 类型中，以便该类型的每个实例现在都“知道”它是否表示合格的等级分。

trans-unit.source: The `Extensions` class also contains a static read-write variable that defines the minimum passing grade.
trans-unit.target: `Extensions`类还包含定义的最小传递评分结果的静态读写变量。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the `Passing` extension method reflects the current value of that variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回值`Passing`扩展方法将反映该变量的当前值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using an enumeration to represent named values and another enumeration to represent named bit fields.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用枚举来表示已命名的值和另一个枚举表示已命名的位域。

trans-unit.target: 如果枚举值 <paramref name="obj" /> 的类型和基础值与此实例相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overrides <xref:System.ValueType.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> to define how enumeration members are evaluated for equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重写<xref:System.ValueType.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>来定义如何将枚举成员评估是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A> 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines two enumeration types, `SledDog` and `WorkDog`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义两种枚举类型，`SledDog`和`WorkDog`。

trans-unit.source: The `SledDog` enumeration has two members, `SledDog.AlaskanMalamute` and `SledDog.Malamute`, that have the same underlying value.
trans-unit.target: `SledDog`枚举具有两个成员，`SledDog.AlaskanMalamute`和`SledDog.Malamute`，具有相同的基础值。

trans-unit.source: The call to the <xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A> method indicates that these values are equal because their underlying values are the same.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A>方法指示这些值是否相等的因为其基础值相同。

trans-unit.source: The `SledDog.Malamute` and `WorkDog.Newfoundland` members have the same underlying value, although they represent different enumeration types.
trans-unit.target: `SledDog.Malamute`和`WorkDog.Newfoundland`该组的成员具有相同的基础值，不过它们表示不同的枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: A call to the <xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A> method indicates that these values are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A>方法指示这些值是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration type of the value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的值的枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: The value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的值。

trans-unit.source: The output format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的输出格式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value of a specified enumerated type to its equivalent string representation according to the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定格式将指定枚举类型的指定值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the valid values for the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的有效值`format`参数。

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: "G" or "g"
trans-unit.target: “G”或“g”

trans-unit.source: If `value` is equal to a named enumerated constant, the name of that constant is returned; otherwise, the decimal equivalent of `value` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是等于命名的枚举常数，该常数的名称是返回; 否则为的十进制等效`value`返回。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the only enumerated constant is named Red, and its value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设仅枚举的常量名为红色，且其值为 1。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is specified as 1, this format returns "Red".
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`指定为 1，则此格式返回"Red"。

trans-unit.source: However, if `value` is specified as 2, this format returns "2".
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果`value`指定为 2，则此格式返回"2"。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> custom attribute is applied to the enumeration, `value` is treated as a bit field that contains one or more flags that consist of one or more bits.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>自定义特性应用于枚举，`value`视为包含一个或多个包含一个或多个位标志的位字段。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is equal to a combination of named enumerated constants, a delimiter-separated list of the names of those constants is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`等于的组合，名为枚举的常数，则返回的分隔符分隔这些常量的名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: `value` is searched for flags, going from the flag with the largest value to the smallest value.
trans-unit.target: `value` 搜索标志，则返回的最大值用到的最小值。

trans-unit.source: For each flag that corresponds to a bit field in `value`, the name of the constant is concatenated to the delimiter-separated list.
trans-unit.target: 对应于一个位字段在每个标志`value`的常数的名称连接到分隔符分隔的列表。

trans-unit.source: The value of that flag is then excluded from further consideration, and the search continues for the next flag.
trans-unit.target: 该标志的值会然后排除进一步考虑，并且搜索会继续进行下一步的标志。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is not equal to a combination of named enumerated constants, the decimal equivalent of `value` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是否不等于的组合命名枚举的常量的十进制等效`value`返回。

trans-unit.source: "X" or "x"
trans-unit.target: “X”或“x”

trans-unit.source: Represents `value` in hexadecimal format without a leading "0x".
trans-unit.target: 表示`value`以十六进制格式而无需前导"0x"。

trans-unit.source: "D" or "d"
trans-unit.target: “D”或“d”

trans-unit.source: Represents `value` in decimal form.
trans-unit.target: 表示`value`以十进制格式。

trans-unit.source: "F" or "f"
trans-unit.target: “F”或“f”

trans-unit.source: Behaves identically to "G" or "g", except that the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> is not required to be present on the <xref:System.Enum> declaration.
trans-unit.target: 行为与"G"或"g"相同，只不过<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>不需要位于<xref:System.Enum>声明。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 返回该实例的值的哈希代码。

trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: The value of a particular enumerated constant in terms of its underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 特定枚举常量的值（根据其基础类型）。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of the constant in the specified enumeration that has the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 在指定枚举中检索具有指定值的常数的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the enumerated constant in <paramref name="enumType" /> whose value is <paramref name="value" />; or <see langword="null" /> if no such constant is found.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含 <paramref name="enumType" /> 中值为 <paramref name="value" /> 的枚举常数的名称；如果没有找到这样的常数，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If multiple enumeration members have the same underlying value, the <xref:System.Enum.GetName%2A> method guarantees that it will return the name of one of those enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个枚举成员具有相同的基础值，<xref:System.Enum.GetName%2A>方法可保证它将返回这些枚举成员之一的名称。

trans-unit.source: However, it does not guarantee that it will always return the name of the same enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它不保证它将始终返回相同的枚举成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: As a result, when multiple enumeration members have the same value, your application code should never depend on the method returning a particular member's name.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当多个枚举成员具有相同的值，应用程序代码应永远不会依赖于返回特定成员的名称的方法。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用`GetName`。

trans-unit.target: 枚举类型。

trans-unit.target: 检索指定枚举中常数名称的数组。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 的常数名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the return value array are sorted by the binary values of the enumerated constants (that is, by their unsigned magnitude).
trans-unit.target: 返回值数组的元素按枚举常量的二进制值进行排序 (即，由它们无符号的量)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例提供有关返回的数组的显示信息<xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A>包括负、 零，并且是正数值的枚举方法。

trans-unit.source: If there are enumerated constants with same value, the order of their corresponding names is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在具有相同值的枚举的常数，则不指定其相应名称的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A> 方法的用法。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 参数不是 <see cref="T:System.Enum" />。

trans-unit.target: 返回此枚举成员的基础类型的类型代码。

trans-unit.source: The type code of the underlying type of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的基础类型的类型代码。

trans-unit.target: 枚举类型未知。

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying type of the specified enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定枚举的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: The underlying type of <paramref name="enumType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum> structure enables values to be represented as named constants.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum>结构使值表示为已命名常数。

trans-unit.source: The data type of the enumeration's values is known as its underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 枚举的值的数据类型被称为其基础类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the underlying type of the <xref:System.DayOfWeek> enumeration, which consists of constants that represent each day of the week (<xref:System.DayOfWeek.Monday?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.DayOfWeek.Tuesday?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and so on), is <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，基础类型的<xref:System.DayOfWeek>枚举，包括表示一周中的每一天的常量 (<xref:System.DayOfWeek.Monday?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.DayOfWeek.Tuesday?displayProperty=nameWithType>，依次类推)，是<xref:System.Int32>。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Enum.GetUnderlyingType%2A> method to display the underlying type of some enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Enum.GetUnderlyingType%2A>方法以显示一些枚举成员的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration type.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of the values of the constants in a specified enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定枚举中常数值的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the values of the constants in <paramref name="enumType" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，其中包含 <paramref name="enumType" /> 中常数的值。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the array are sorted by the binary values of the enumeration constants (that is, by their unsigned magnitude).
trans-unit.target: 数组的元素按枚举常量的二进制值进行排序 (即，由它们无符号的量)。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information about the array returned by the <xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A> method for an enumeration that includes a negative value, zero, and a positive value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示返回的数组信息<xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A>包括值为负、 零，并且是正数值的枚举方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A> method returns an array that contains a value for each member of the `enumType` enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A>方法返回的每个成员包含一个值的数组`enumType`枚举。

trans-unit.source: If multiple members have the same value, the returned array includes duplicate values.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个成员具有相同的值，则返回的数组包含重复值。

trans-unit.source: In this case, calling the <xref:System.Enum.GetName%2A> method with each value in the returned array does not restore the unique names assigned to members that have duplicate values.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，调用<xref:System.Enum.GetName%2A>方法返回的数组中每个值不会还原分配给具有重复值的成员的唯一名称。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve all the names of enumeration members successfully, call the <xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功检索的枚举成员的所有名称，请调用<xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A> method cannot be invoked by using reflection in a reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A>无法在仅限反射上下文中使用反射调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can retrieve the value of all enumeration members by using the <xref:System.Type.GetFields%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to get an array of <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> objects that represent enumeration members and then call the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetRawConstantValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on each element of the array.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以通过使用来检索所有枚举成员的值<xref:System.Type.GetFields%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以获取数组的<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>对象，表示枚举成员，然后调用<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetRawConstantValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>对数组的每个元素的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this technique.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示此方法。

trans-unit.source: It requires that you define the following enumeration in an assembly named Enumerations.dll:
trans-unit.target: 它需要的程序集中名为 Enumerations.dll 定义以下枚举：

trans-unit.source: The assembly is loaded in a reflection-only context, a <xref:System.Type> object that represents the `Pets` enumeration is instantiated, an array of <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> objects is retrieved, and the field values are displayed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在仅限反射上下文中，加载程序集的<xref:System.Type>对象，表示`Pets`枚举实例化，数组<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>检索对象，并向控制台显示的字段值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of <xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Enum.GetValues%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="enumType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="enumType" /> is not an <see cref="T:System.Enum" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Enum" />。

trans-unit.source: The method is invoked by reflection in a reflection-only context,
trans-unit.target: 在仅限反射的上下文中通过反射调用方法，

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="enumType" /> is a type from an assembly loaded in a reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 是从一个只反射上下文中加载的程序集的类型。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether one or more bit fields are set in the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前实例中是否设置了一个或多个位域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the bit field or bit fields that are set in <paramref name="flag" /> are also set in the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <paramref name="flag" /> 中设置的位域也在当前实例中进行了设置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A> method returns the result of the following Boolean expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A>方法返回以下布尔表达式的结果。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying value of `flag` is zero, the method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果的基础值`flag`为零，该方法返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is not desirable, you can use the <xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A> method to test for equality with zero and call <xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A> only if the underlying value of `flag` is non-zero, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 如果此行为不可取，则可以使用<xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A>方法来测试相等性零并调用<xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A>才的基础值`flag`为非零，如下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A> method is designed to be used with enumeration types that are marked with the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> attribute and can be used to determine whether multiple bit fields are set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A>方法旨在用于与标记的枚举类型<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>属性，并可以用于确定是否设置了多个位字段。

trans-unit.source: For enumeration types that are not marked with the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> attribute, call either the <xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A> method or the <xref:System.Enum.CompareTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 对于未用标记的枚举类型<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>属性，请调用<xref:System.Enum.Equals%2A>方法或<xref:System.Enum.CompareTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines an `ItemsOrdered` enumeration that reflects categories of items that a customer can order in a restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义`ItemsOrdered`反映客户可以在一家餐厅进行排序的项的类别的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The example tests whether the customer has ordered both an entrée and a beverage.
trans-unit.target: 该示例测试是否客户具有顺序点了主菜和饮料。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="flag" /> is a different type than the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flag" /> 是与当前实例不同的类型。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: The value or name of a constant in <c>enumType</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>enumType</c> 的常数的值或名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean telling whether a given integral value, or its name as a string, exists in a specified enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示给定的整数值或其名称字符串是否存在于指定的枚举中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a constant in <paramref name="enumType" /> has a value equal to <paramref name="value" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="enumType" /> 的某个常数具有等于 <paramref name="value" /> 的值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `value`参数可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: Any member of type `enumType`.
trans-unit.target: 类型的任何成员`enumType`。

trans-unit.source: A variable whose value is an enumeration member of type `enumType`.
trans-unit.target: 其值为枚举成员的类型的变量`enumType`。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the name of an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的枚举成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: The characters in the string must have the same case as the enumeration member name.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串中的字符必须具有相同的大小写的枚举成员名称。

trans-unit.source: A value of the underlying type of `enumType`.
trans-unit.target: 值的基础类型为`enumType`。

trans-unit.source: If the constants in `enumType` define a set of bit fields and `value` contains the values, names, or underlying values of multiple bit fields, the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在常量`enumType`定义一组的位字段和`value`包含值、 名称或基础值的多个位字段，<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: In other words, for enumerations that define a set of bit fields, the method determines only whether a single bit field belongs to the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，定义一组的位域的枚举，该方法确定仅单个位字段是否属于枚举。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether multiple bit fields are set in an enumeration type that is tagged with the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> attribute, you can call the <xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否使用标记的枚举类型中设置多个位字段<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>属性，可以调用<xref:System.Enum.HasFlag%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines an enumeration named `PetType` that consists of individual bit fields.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义名为枚举`PetType`组成的单个位域。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method with possible underlying enumeration values, string names, and composite values that result from setting multiple bit fields.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它调用<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>具有基础枚举值、 字符串名称和得到设置多个位域的复合值的可能的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="enumType" /> or <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 或 <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="enumType" /> is not an <see langword="Enum" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 不是 <see langword="Enum" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The type of <paramref name="value" /> is an enumeration, but it is not an enumeration of type <paramref name="enumType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的类型是枚举，但不是 <paramref name="enumType" /> 类型的枚举。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The type of <paramref name="value" /> is not an underlying type of <paramref name="enumType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的类型不是 <paramref name="enumType" /> 的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not type <see cref="T:System.SByte" />, <see cref="T:System.Int16" />, <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, <see cref="T:System.Int64" />, <see cref="T:System.Byte" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt16" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt32" />, or <see cref="T:System.UInt64" />, or <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的类型不为 <see cref="T:System.SByte" />、<see cref="T:System.Int16" />、<see cref="T:System.Int32" />、<see cref="T:System.Int64" />、<see cref="T:System.Byte" />、<see cref="T:System.UInt16" />、<see cref="T:System.UInt32" /><see cref="T:System.UInt64" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="enumType" /> is an enumeration that is defined by using the <see cref="T:System.FlagsAttribute" /> attribute, the method returns <see langword="false" /> if multiple bit fields in <paramref name="value" /> are set but <paramref name="value" /> does not correspond to a composite enumeration value, or if <paramref name="value" /> is a string concatenation of the names of multiple bit flags.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="enumType" />是一个枚举，通过定义<see cref="T:System.FlagsAttribute" />属性，该方法返回<see langword="false" />如果中的多个位字段<paramref name="value" />设置但<paramref name="value" />不对应一个复合枚举值，或者如果<paramref name="value" />是字符串串联的多个位标志的名称。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <c>Pets</c> enumeration is defined with the <see cref="T:System.FlagsAttribute" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，<c>宠物</c>枚举定义与<see cref="T:System.FlagsAttribute" />属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Enum.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Object)" /> method returns <see langword="false" /> when you pass it an enumeration value that has two bit fields (<c>Pets.Dog</c> and <c>Pets.Cat</c>) set, and when you pass it the string representation of that enumeration value ("Dog, Cat").
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Enum.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Object)" />方法返回<see langword="false" />传递时，它具有两个位域，一个枚举值 (<c>Pets.Dog</c>和<c>Pets.Cat</c>) 设置，并当你向其传递的字符串表示形式，枚举值 （"Dog，Cat"）。

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether multiple bit fields are set by calling the <see cref="M:System.Enum.HasFlag(System.Enum)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定是否通过调用设置了多个位字段<see cref="M:System.Enum.HasFlag(System.Enum)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个枚举常数的名称或数字值的字符串表示转换成等效的枚举对象。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name or value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的值或名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个枚举常数的名称或数字值的字符串表示转换成等效的枚举对象。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <paramref name="enumType" /> whose value is represented by <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 类型的对象，其值由 <paramref name="value" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter contains the string representation of an enumeration member's underlying value or named constant, or a list of named constants delimited by commas (,).
trans-unit.target: `value`参数包含的字符串表示形式的枚举成员的基础值或已命名的常数、 或的列表命名常量由逗号 （，） 分隔。

trans-unit.source: One or more blank spaces can precede or follow each value, name, or comma in `value`.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个空格可以前面或后面每个值、 名称或在逗号`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a list, the return value is the value of the specified names combined with a bitwise `OR` operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是列表，则返回值是与按位组合的指定名称的值`OR`操作。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a name that does not correspond to a named constant of `enumType`, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是不对应的命名常量的名称`enumType`，该方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is the string representation of an integer that does not represent an underlying value of the `enumType` enumeration, the method returns an enumeration member whose underlying value is `value` converted to an integral type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是一个整数，它不表示的基础值的字符串表示`enumType`枚举，该方法返回一个枚举成员，其基础值为`value`转换为整数类型。

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is undesirable, call the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method to ensure that a particular string representation of an integer is actually a member of `enumType`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要此行为，调用<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>方法，以确保特定的字符串表示形式整数是实际的成员`enumType`。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Colors` enumeration, calls the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29> method to convert strings to their corresponding enumeration values, and calls the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method to ensure that particular integral values are underlying values in the `Colors` enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义`Colors`枚举，调用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29>方法将字符串转换为其相应的枚举值和调用<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>中值的方法，以确保特定的整数值基础`Colors`枚举。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此操作是区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29> method to parse an array of strings that are created by calling the <xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29>方法，以便分析通过调用创建的字符串数组<xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29> method to parse an enumeration value that consists of a bit field.
trans-unit.target: 它还使用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29>方法，以便分析包含位域的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="enumType" /> or <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 或 <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="enumType" /> is not an <see cref="T:System.Enum" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="enumType" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Enum" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is either an empty string or only contains white space.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为空字符串或只包含空白。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is a name, but not one of the named constants defined for the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是一个名称，但不是为该枚举定义的指定常量之一。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 超出 <paramref name="enumType" /> 基础类型的范围。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name or value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的值或名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore case; <see langword="false" /> to regard case.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 为忽略大小写；<see langword="false" /> 为考虑大小写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个枚举常数的名称或数字值的字符串表示转换成等效的枚举对象。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <paramref name="enumType" /> whose value is represented by <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter contains the string representation of an enumeration member's underlying value or named constant, or a list of named constants delimited by commas (,).

trans-unit.source: One or more blank spaces can precede or follow each value, name, or comma in `value`.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个空格可以前面或后面每个值、 名称或在逗号`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a list, the return value is the value of the specified names combined with a bitwise `OR` operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是列表，则返回值是与按位组合的指定名称的值`OR`操作。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a name that does not correspond to a named constant of `enumType`, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是不对应的命名常量的名称`enumType`，该方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is the string representation of an integer that does not represent an underlying value of the `enumType` enumeration, the method returns an enumeration member whose underlying value is `value` converted to an integral type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是一个整数，它不表示的基础值的字符串表示`enumType`枚举，该方法返回一个枚举成员，其基础值为`value`转换为整数类型。

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is undesirable, call the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method to ensure that a particular string representation of an integer is actually a member of `enumType`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要此行为，调用<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>方法，以确保特定的字符串表示形式整数是实际的成员`enumType`。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Colors` enumeration, calls the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method to convert strings to their corresponding enumeration values, and calls the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method to ensure that particular integral values are underlying values in the `Colors` enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义`Colors`枚举，调用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法将字符串转换为其相应的枚举值和调用<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>中值的方法，以确保特定的整数值基础`Colors`枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `ignoreCase` parameter specifies whether this operation is case-sensitive.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method to parse an array of strings that are created by calling the <xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法，以便分析通过调用创建的字符串数组<xref:System.Enum.GetNames%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of this instance to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 将此实例的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of this instance to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 将此实例的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the value of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The return value is formatted with the general format specifier ("G").
trans-unit.target: 返回的值进行格式设置常规格式说明符 ("G")。

trans-unit.source: That is, if the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> is not applied to this enumerated type and there is a named constant equal to the value of this instance, then the return value is a string containing the name of the constant.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，如果<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>不应用于此枚举类型并没有命名常量，等于此实例的值，然后返回值是一个包含字符串的常数的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> is applied and there is a combination of one or more named constants equal to the value of this instance, then the return value is a string containing a delimiter-separated list of the names of the constants.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>应用等于此实例的值是一个或多个已命名常数的组合，然后返回值是一个包含字符串的分隔符分隔常数名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the return value is the string representation of the numeric value of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 否则，返回值是此实例的数字值的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting enumeration values, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关格式设置的枚举值的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting in general, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关格式设置的常规详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates converting an enumerated value to a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将一个枚举的值转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: If multiple enumeration members have the same underlying value and you attempt to retrieve the string representation of an enumeration member's name based on its underlying value, your code should not make any assumptions about which name the method will return.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个枚举成员具有相同的基础值，并且你想要检索的字符串表示形式根据其基础值的枚举成员的名称，你的代码不应作出任何假设，该方法将返回有关的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following enumeration defines two members, <c>Shade.Gray</c> and <c>Shade.Grey</c>, that have the same underlying value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的枚举定义两个成员， <c>Shade.Gray</c>和<c>Shade.Grey</c>，具有相同的基础值。

trans-unit.source: The following method call attempts to retrieve the name of a member of the <c>Shade</c> enumeration whose underlying value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的方法调用尝试检索的一个成员的名称<c>阴影</c>枚举其基础值为 1。

trans-unit.source: The method can return either "Gray" or "Grey", and your code should not make any assumptions about which string will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可以返回"Gray"或"Grey"和你的代码不应将哪些返回字符串的任何假设。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of this instance to its equivalent string representation using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定格式将此实例的值转换成其等效的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the value of this instance as specified by <paramref name="format" />.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的值的字符串表示形式，由 <paramref name="format" /> 指定。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter can contain the "G" or "g", "D" or "d", "X" or "x", and "F" or "f" format strings (the format string is not case-sensitive).
trans-unit.target: `format`参数可以包含"G"或"g"、"D"或"d"、"X"或"x"和"F"或"f"格式字符串 （格式字符串不区分大小写）。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the general format specifier ("G") is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，使用常规格式说明符 ("G")。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the enumeration format strings and formatting enumeration values, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关枚举格式字符串和格式设置的枚举值的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个枚举常数的名称或数字值的字符串表示转换成等效的枚举对象。

trans-unit.source: The return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示转换是否成功的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration type to which to convert <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要转换为枚举类型<c>值</c>。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the enumeration name or underlying value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的枚举名称或基础值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, <c>result</c> contains an object of type <c>TEnum</c> whose value is represented by <c>value</c> if the parse operation succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，如果分析操作成功，则 <c>result</c> 包含其值由 <c>value</c> 表示的 <c>TEnum</c> 类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the parse operation fails, <c>result</c> contains the default value of the underlying type of <c>TEnum</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果分析操作失败，<c>result</c> 包括 <c>TEnum</c> 基础类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Note that this value need not be a member of the <c>TEnum</c> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此值无需为 <c>TEnum</c> 枚举的成员。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个枚举常数的名称或数字值的字符串表示转换成等效的枚举对象。

trans-unit.source: The return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示转换是否成功的返回值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 参数成功转换，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2C%60%600%40%29> is identical to the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29> method, except that instead of throwing an exception, it returns `false` if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2C%60%600%40%29> 等同于<xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%29>方法，而不是引发异常，它将返回的只不过`false`如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: It eliminates the need for exception handling when parsing the string representation of an enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 它不需要处理分析的字符串表示形式的枚举值时的异常。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter contains the string representation of an enumeration member's underlying value or named constant, or a list of named constants or underlying values delimited by commas (,).
trans-unit.target: `value`参数包含的字符串表示形式的枚举成员的基础值或已命名的常数，或由逗号 （，） 分隔的已命名的常数或基础值的列表。

trans-unit.source: If `value` includes multiple named constants or values, one or more blank spaces can precede or follow each value, name, or comma in `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`包含多个名为常量或值，一个或多个空格可以前加上或按照每个值、 名称或在逗号`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a list, `result` reflects the value of the specified names or underlying values combined with a bitwise `OR` operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是列表，`result`反映指定名称的值或基础值的按位组合`OR`操作。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is the string representation of the name of an enumeration value, the comparison of `value` with enumeration names is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是一个枚举值，比较的名称的字符串表示`value`枚举的名称是区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a name that does not correspond to a named constant of `TEnum`, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是不对应的命名常量的名称`TEnum`，该方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is the string representation of an integer that does not represent an underlying value of the `TEnum` enumeration, the method returns an enumeration member whose underlying value is `value` converted to an integral type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是一个整数，它不表示的基础值的字符串表示`TEnum`枚举，该方法返回一个枚举成员，其基础值为`value`转换为整数类型。

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is undesirable, call the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method to ensure that a particular string representation of an integer is actually a member of `TEnum`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要此行为，调用<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>方法，以确保特定的字符串表示形式整数是实际的成员`TEnum`。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Colors` enumeration, calls the <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2C%60%600%40%29> method to convert strings to their corresponding enumeration values, and calls the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method to ensure that particular integral values are underlying values in the `Colors` enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义`Colors`枚举，调用<xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2C%60%600%40%29>方法将字符串转换为其相应的枚举值和调用<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>中值的方法，以确保特定的整数值基础`Colors`枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="TEnum" /> is not an enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TEnum" /> 不是枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration type to which to convert <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要转换为枚举类型<c>值</c>。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the enumeration name or underlying value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的枚举名称或基础值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore case; <see langword="false" /> to consider case.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示不区分大小写；<see langword="false" /> 表示区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, <c>result</c> contains an object of type <c>TEnum</c> whose value is represented by <c>value</c> if the parse operation succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，如果分析操作成功，则 <c>result</c> 包含其值由 <c>value</c> 表示的 <c>TEnum</c> 类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the parse operation fails, <c>result</c> contains the default value of the underlying type of <c>TEnum</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果分析操作失败，<c>result</c> 包括 <c>TEnum</c> 基础类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Note that this value need not be a member of the <c>TEnum</c> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此值无需为 <c>TEnum</c> 枚举的成员。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个枚举常数的名称或数字值的字符串表示转换成等效的枚举对象。

trans-unit.source: A parameter specifies whether the operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 一个参数指定该操作是否区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示转换是否成功的返回值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 参数成功转换，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2C%60%600%40%29> is identical to the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method, except that instead of throwing an exception, it returns `false` if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2C%60%600%40%29> 等同于<xref:System.Enum.Parse%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法，而不是引发异常，它将返回的只不过`false`如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: It eliminates the need for exception handling when parsing the string representation of an enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 它不需要处理分析的字符串表示形式的枚举值时的异常。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter contains the string representation of an enumeration member's underlying value or named constant, or a list of named constants or underlying values delimited by commas (,).
trans-unit.target: `value`参数包含的字符串表示形式的枚举成员的基础值或已命名的常数，或由逗号 （，） 分隔的已命名的常数或基础值的列表。

trans-unit.source: If `value` includes multiple named constants or values, one or more blank spaces can precede or follow each value, name, or comma in `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`包含多个名为常量或值，一个或多个空格可以前加上或按照每个值、 名称或在逗号`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a list, `result` reflects the value of the specified names or underlying values combined with a bitwise `OR` operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是列表，`result`反映指定名称的值或基础值的按位组合`OR`操作。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is the string representation of the name of an enumeration value, the comparison of `value` with enumeration names depends on the `ignoreCase` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是一个枚举值，比较的名称的字符串表示`value`枚举名称依赖于`ignoreCase`参数。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the comparison is case-insensitive; if `false`, it is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，比较不区分大小写; 如果`false`，它是区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a name that does not correspond to a named constant of `TEnum`, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是不对应的命名常量的名称`TEnum`，该方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is the string representation of an integer that does not represent an underlying value of the `TEnum` enumeration, the method returns an enumeration member whose underlying value is `value` converted to an integral type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是一个整数，它不表示的基础值的字符串表示`TEnum`枚举，该方法返回一个枚举成员，其基础值为`value`转换为整数类型。

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is undesirable, call the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method to ensure that a particular string representation of an integer is actually a member of `TEnum`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要此行为，调用<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>方法，以确保特定的字符串表示形式整数是实际的成员`TEnum`。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Colors` enumeration, calls the <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2C%60%600%40%29> method to convert strings to their corresponding enumeration values, and calls the <xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A> method to ensure that particular integral values are underlying values in the `Colors` enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义`Colors`枚举，调用<xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2C%60%600%40%29>方法将字符串转换为其相应的枚举值和调用<xref:System.Enum.IsDefined%2A>中值的方法，以确保特定的整数值基础`Colors`枚举。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2C%60%600%40%29> method uses case-insensitive comparison when trying to convert the string representations of named constants to their equivalent enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Enum.TryParse%60%601%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2C%60%600%40%29>方法使用不区分大小写的比较时尝试转换的字符串表示形式命名为其等效的枚举值的常量。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="TEnum" /> is not an enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TEnum" /> 不是枚举类型。
